channel.title: [pi] is there a way
channel.description:
to make it so my account can only log in from localhost?
pretty self explanitory.

item.title: [pi] is there a way
item.dc:creator: @runewings317 runewings317
item.description:
@runewings317 wrote:

[quote=“patargangstar, post:4, topic:398397”][quote author=Marine5288 link=topic=495532.msg3622864#msg3622864 date=1307587022]

Wait, like you mean so it logs into localhost (unlike the rest of the players) or like you can’t log in from any IP.

He means he only wants him to be able to log in on his account from his IP.
[/quote][/quote]Thank-you for quoting Marine…

@topic
It probably would be possible, but I wouldn’t know how to do it. You would have to mess around with stuff in the log in handler and stuff like that.

Read full topic
